levels.description: Immediately generates <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP and causes the Wolfpack's next attack to deal <@ba.vup>{vigil_wolf_s_2.atk_scale:0%}</> damage and restore <@ba.vup>{vigil_wolf_s_2.hp_ratio:0%}</> of its Max HP; Generates an additional <@ba.vup>{vigil_wolf_s_2.cost}</> DP if the Wolfpack defeats an enemy
